title: Example: Image Captioning with Transformers

definitions.Image Captioning: The process of generating textual descriptions for images.
definitions.Transformer: A type of model architecture used in deep learning for tasks such as language translation and image captioning.

summary: The slide provides an example of image captioning using a transformer model. It includes a diagram showing the flow from input image to output caption, with a transformer encoder and decoder. The encoder processes the image into a sequence of tokens, which the decoder then uses to generate a caption.
